# Scale predictions of level 2 cover variables so each grouping sums to 100

## For components of total herbaceous cover

###
*Scaled C3 grass percentage* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.3.1}{(eqn. 2.3.1 + eqn. 2.3.2 + eqn. 2.3.3)}$

###
*Scaled C4 grass percentage* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.3.2}{(eqn. 2.3.1 + eqn. 2.3.2 + eqn. 2.3.3)}$

###
*Scaled forb grass percentage* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.3.3}{(eqn. 2.3.1 + eqn. 2.3.2 + eqn. 2.3.3)}$

## For components of total tree cover -- forest

###
*Scaled broad-leaved tree percentage* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.3.4}{(eqn. 2.3.4 + eqn. 2.3.5)}$

###
*Scaled needle-leaved tree percentage* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.3.5}{(eqn. 2.3.4 + eqn. 2.3.5)}$

## For components of total tree cover -- non-forest

###
*Scaled broad-leaved tree percentage* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.3.6}{(eqn. 2.3.6 + eqn. 2.3.7)}$

###
*Scaled needle-leaved tree percentage* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.3.7}{(eqn. 2.3.6 + eqn. 2.3.7)}$

# Where relevant, "relativize" the model predictions according to predicted ecoregion percentage

## Level 1-- Total Tree Cover 
*Relativized total tree cover* $= (eqn. 2.2.4 * eqn.2.1) + (eqn. 2.2.3 * (1-eqn.2.1))$

## Level 1-- Total Herbaceous Cover
*Relativized total herbaceous cover* $= (eqn. 2.2.2 * eqn.2.1) + (eqn. 2.2.1 * (1-eqn.2.1))$

## Level 2-- Broad-leaved tree percentage
*Relativized and scaled broad-leaved tree percentage* $= (eqn. 3.2.1 * eqn.2.1) + (eqn.3.3.1 * (1-eqn.2.1))$

## Level 2-- Needle-leaved tree percentage
*Relativized and scaled needle-leaved tree percentage* $= (eqn. 3.2.2 * eqn.2.1) + (eqn.3.3.2 * (1-eqn.2.1))$

# Scale relativized predictions of level 1 cover variables to sum to 100, **resulting in final predictions of level 1 cover variables**
## 
*final Total Herbaceous Cover* $= \frac{ eqn. 4.2}{(eqn. 4.2 + eqn. 4.1 + eqn. 2.2.5 + eqn. 2.2.6)}$

##
*final Total Tree Cover* $= \frac{ eqn. 4.1}{(eqn. 4.2 + eqn. 4.1 + eqn. 2.2.5 + eqn. 2.2.6)}$

##
*final Shrub Cover* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.2.5}{(eqn. 4.2 + eqn. 4.1 + eqn. 2.2.5 + eqn. 2.2.6)}$

##
*final Bare Ground Cover* $= \frac{ eqn. 2.2.6}{(eqn. 4.2 + eqn. 4.1 + eqn. 2.2.5 + eqn. 2.2.6)}$

# Multiply scaled (and relativized, where applicable) predictions of level 2 cover variables by scaled and relativized level 1 cover variable predictions,  **resulting in final predictions of level 2 cover variables**
## 
*final C4 grass cover* $= \frac{eqn.3.1.1}{100} * eqn. 5.1$

## 
*final C3 grass cover*$= \frac{eqn.3.1.2}{100} * eqn. 5.1$

## 
*final forb cover* $= \frac{eqn.3.1.3}{100} * eqn. 5.1$

## 
*final broad-leaved tree cover* $= \frac{eqn.4.3}{100} * eqn. 5.2$

## 
*final needle-leaved tree cover* $= \frac{eqn.4.4}{100} * eqn. 5.2$
